## Homework Check!

Create vectors a and b from the day 3 task and check the work I did by hand.

```{r}
# Create the vectors

vec_a <- c(1, 6)

vec_b <- c(2, 4)

# Not check the work!

vec_a + vec_b

vec_b - vec_a

4 * vec_a

vec_a %*% vec_b

# It all looks good!
```
